crystal_guardian_mission.name: Crystal Awakening
crystal_guardian_mission.description: The Crystalline Forest awakens. Defeat 3 Ancient Spirits to investigate the disturbance.

flame_guardian_mission.name: Eternal Flame
flame_guardian_mission.description: The Phoenix Temple's guardian has been disturbed. Defeat 4 Fire Spirits and 2 Dark Knights.

shadow_assassin_mission.name: Shadow Stalkers
shadow_assassin_mission.description: Shadow Assassins have been targeting travelers. Defeat 5 Shadow Assassins in the Crystalline Forest.

forest_protector_mission.name: Elven Alliance
forest_protector_mission.description: The Elven Lord seeks brave allies. Defeat 3 Forest Hunters to prove your worth.

crystal_golem_boss_mission.name: Golem Slayer
crystal_golem_boss_mission.description: The Crystal Golem has become corrupted. Defeat this massive construct in the Crystalline Forest.

phoenix_boss_mission.name: Phoenix Rising
phoenix_boss_mission.description: The Phoenix Guardian guards the Temple of the Phoenix. Face this immortal creature.

elven_lord_boss_mission.name: Elven Sovereign
elven_lord_boss_mission.description: The Elven Lord demands tribute. Defeat this noble guardian to earn the forest's blessing.

shadow_conqueror_mission.name: Conquer the Shadows
shadow_conqueror_mission.description: The Shadow Realm threatens to consume all light. Enter and defeat the Shadow Overlord.

collect_moonstones.name: Crystal Collection
collect_moonstones.description: Gather rare Moonstones from across the realms: 10 Moonstones total.

elemental_harmony.name: Elemental Balance
elemental_harmony.description: Collect elemental essences: 5 Fire Gems, 5 Moonstones, and 3 Void Crystals.

master_of_all_realms.name: Realm Master
master_of_all_realms.description: Complete all mod content by defeating all mod bosses: Crystal Golem, Phoenix Guardian, Elven Lord, and Shadow Overlord.
